body.subject: Deployment unblocked - starting staged rollout
body.summary: Acknowledged Epic 28 approval and release_gate: true. Updated deployment.json status to READY. All quality gates passed, all blocker requirements met. Starting staged rollout per deployment.json with validation gates at each stage. Monitoring and rollback plans ready.
key_points: Deployment.json updated: status changed from BLOCKED to READY
Quality approval acknowledged: release_gate: true, all quality gates passed
Deployment readiness confirmed: all blocker requirements met
Deployment strategy: staged rollout (staging → canary → production)
Monitoring ready: Prometheus metrics exported, structured logging configured
Rollback plans ready: per-task, full, partial - all tested
body.action_needed: Deployment proceeding with staged rollout per deployment.json. Monitoring metrics and health checks at each stage. Will report deployment status and any issues via structured messages.
